title: When Will The Phone Number Be Obvious?

data.title: When Will The Phone Number Be Obvious?
data.solution:
phone_number = gets.chomp
n = gets.to_i
phone_book = []
n.times do
  saved_number = gets.chomp
  phone_book << saved_number
end

if phone_book.include?( phone_number )
  index = (0..).find{|i| phone_book.one?{|number| number[0..i] == phone_number[0..i] } }
  puts phone_number[0..index]
else
  puts phone_number
end
data.statement:
When I'm typing a number into my mobile phone, it can auto-finish the number for me if I've typed enough of it so that it only matches one entry from my history.

For an input [[phone_number]], print how much of the number I need to type for it to auto-finish. You are given an integer [[n]] and then [[n]] [[saved_number]]s from my phone history.

If the number is not a [[saved_number]], then you have to type all of it.
data.constraints:
All numbers will be formatted as strings of digits, with no spaces or symbols.
0 < [[n]] < 30
data.stubGenerator:
read phoneNumber:string(10)
read n:int
loop n read savedNumber:string(10)
write How much I need to type

STATEMENT
Phone auto-complete
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1 :>> The [[phone_number]] in question.
<<Line 2 :>> An integer [[n]], the number of phone numbers saved in my phone
<<Next [[n]] lines :>> A [[saved_number]] from my phone
data.outputDescription: <<1 line :>> The minimum-length string of digits you need to type such that my phone will know who I want to call

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

When I'm typing a number into my mobile phone, it can auto-finish the number for me if I've typed enough of it so that it only matches one entry from my history.

For an input phone_number, print how much of the number I need to type for it to auto-finish. You are given an integer n and then n saved_numbers from my phone history.

If the number is not a saved_number, then you have to type all of it.
Input
Line 1 : The phone_number in question.
Line 2 : An integer n, the number of phone numbers saved in my phone
Next n lines : A saved_number from my phone
Output
1 line : The minimum-length string of digits you need to type such that my phone will know who I want to call
Constraints
All numbers will be formatted as strings of digits, with no spaces or symbols.
0 < n < 30
Example
Input
911
4
9992123
9029991
911
8281004
Output
91
